thread.title: Nara Rohit's next to have sizzling dances
thread.title_full: Nara Rohit's next to have sizzling dances - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Nara Rohit's next to have sizzling dances
text: Actor Nara Rohit, who is known for his selection of interesting stories, is currently shooting for a film in Kumar Nagendra's direction. The film is nearing its completion and the makers will unveil the film's first look on Vijaya Dasami. As per the latest reports, Nara Rohit is all set to surprise his fans with his energetic dances in the film. The director, in his latest interview, said that choreographer Baba Bhaskhar composed a few difficult dance movements and Nara Rohit stunned the unit members with his effortless dancing. This yet to be titled film is a remake of the superhit Tamil film, Maan Karate. Latha Hegde will be making her silver screen debut with this film. Jil fame Kabir Duhan Singh is playing the villain's role. The film is being produced by Nagarjun and Ashok.
